amendment.description: To amend the requirements for the designation of Moving-To-Work agencies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 806 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 806 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR 10/20/2011 S6850; text: CR 10/20/2011 S6850) To amend the requirements for the designation of Moving-To-Work agencies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 806 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 806 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Hutchison.
